summary: Comprehensive testing of all auth and profile features completed successfully. Backend: 16/16 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All UI flows tested and working - Login, Signup with OTP, Forgot Password, Profile Update, Change Password, Admin & Member Dashboards.

issues: Minor React hydration warning in console: '<span> cannot be a child of <select>' - doesn't affect functionality but indicates a minor HTML structure issue in the DOB selector dropdowns

passed_tests: Backend: Admin login with valid credentials - 200 OK
Backend: Member login with valid credentials - 200 OK
Backend: Login with invalid credentials - 401 Rejected
Backend: Login with phone number - 200 OK
Backend: Send OTP for new user - 200 OK
Backend: Duplicate email prevention - 400 with 'already registered' message
Backend: Duplicate phone prevention - 400 with 'already registered' message
Backend: Complete E2E signup flow (Send OTP → Verify → Create Account → Auto-login)
Backend: Forgot password sends OTP - 200 OK
Backend: Forgot password for non-existent email - 200 (security)
Backend: Reset password with OTP - 200 OK
Backend: Get current user profile - 200 OK
Backend: Update profile info - 200 OK
Backend: Change password - 200 OK
Backend: Change password with wrong current password - 400 Rejected
Backend: Admin dashboard stats - all fields present
UI: Login page loads with all form elements
UI: Login with valid credentials redirects to member dashboard
UI: Signup page Step 1 - all form elements present
UI: Country code defaults to +91 in signup
UI: Signup OTP step shows after form submission
UI: Forgot password page Step 1 loads correctly
UI: Forgot password Step 2 (OTP + new password) loads after email submission
UI: Member Profile page loads with all form elements
UI: Profile update saves successfully with toast notification
UI: Change Password form elements all present
UI: Admin Dashboard loads with all stat cards (Total Members, Active Memberships, Today's Collection, Present Today)
UI: Admin Dashboard shows Today's Birthdays widget
UI: Admin Dashboard shows Upcoming Birthdays (7 days) widget
UI: Admin Dashboard shows Upcoming Renewals widget
UI: Admin Dashboard shows Regular Absentees (7+ days) widget
seed_data_creation: E2E signup tests create test users with phone prefix 55555* and 77777*
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested auth flows working: 1) Signup with OTP - complete E2E tested including duplicate prevention, 2) Login with email/phone, 3) Forgot Password with OTP reset UI, 4) Member Profile update and Change Password, 5) Admin Dashboard with all widgets. OTPs are stored in MongoDB test_database.otps collection. Password reset OTPs in test_database.password_resets.

signup_flow.details: Complete E2E: Send OTP → Verify OTP → Create Account → Auto-login

duplicate_prevention.details: API rejects duplicate email or phone with clear error message

forgot_password.details: 3-step UI flow: Enter email → Enter OTP + New Password → Success

login.details: Works with both email and phone number

member_profile.details: View and update profile info with save confirmation

change_password.details: Change password with current password validation

member_dashboard.details: Loads with user info, membership status, calendar, announcements

admin_dashboard.details: All stats and widgets display correctly
